name: Nihilethic Dominator
description: A large undead creature with a dark presence, the Nihilethic Dominator manifests as an intimidating being capable of maneuvering through surroundings and striking fiercely.
memorable: Its ability to knock opponents prone and resist damage from nonmagical attacks makes it uniquely formidable in battle.
goals: Typically seeks to dominate its foes and maintain its existence through sustained combat.
relations: May serve as a commander or overseer for other undead creatures.
environment: Commonly found in dark, foreboding locales such as abandoned mausoleums or haunted ruins.
strengths: Damage immunities to cold, necrotic, and poison, along with resilience to falling to 0 hit points makes it a durable opponent.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity affects its agility and ranged defenses significantly.
attacks: Utilizes strong melee attacks, including Claw strikes that can deal slashing damage and Tendril attacks that inflict cold and necrotic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Ghostly Body grants it the ability to move through objects, resisting nonmagical attacks.
additional_information: Can transform between Undead and Void ghost forms.
Has a debilitating claw attack that can knock foes prone.
test_queries: undead creature that can knock opponents prone
monster immune to cold and necrotic damage
evil undead that resists nonmagical damage
